  • Classes in com.untamedears.contraptions.gadgets used by com.untamedears.contraptions.gadgets 
    Class and Description
    AreaTransferGadget
    A gadget which will transfer a resource over time This gadget transfers a resource from a contraption to all of the contraptions surrounding it within a particular radius Format of JSON object should be as follows:
    ConversionGadget
    A gadget which will converts between ItemStacks and resources This can be used for things such as powering Contraptions via the items they contain within them It can be imported from a JSON object in the following format
    GrowGadget
    A widget which will grow a resource over time Format of JSON object should be as follows:
    MatchGadget
    A gadget which only consumes ItemStacks if they are the only ones present This can be used to specify a contraption being built It can be imported from a JSON object in the following format
    MinMaxGadget
    A Gadget which bounds a resource to a minimum and maximum value Format of JSON object should be as follows:
    ProductionGadget
    A gadget the produces a set of ItemStacks from another set of ItemStacks It can be imported from a config with the following JSON object:
